kickstart.controller

Class ManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kickstart.controller.ManagementController

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="management")
public class ManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the user access rights

    02.11.15 edit last time by Alexej 12/08/2015

    codemunin

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagementController

        @Autowired
public ManagementController(CProgram cProgram,
                                        DBCRoom dbcRoom,
                                        DBSeat dbSeat,
                                        DBRow dbRow,
                                        DBDate dbDate,
                                        DBMovie dbMovie,
                                        org.salespointframework.time.BusinessTime businessTime,
                                        org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccountManager userAccountManager,
                                        CustomerRepository customerRepository,
                                        DBEmployee dbEmployee,
                                        DBEvent dbEvent,
                                        DBRoom dbRoom)
        Creates a new Management Controller responsible for the user level administration of each user
        Parameters:
        businessTime - BusinessTime : SalesPoint time
        userAccountManager - UserAccountManager : Provided by SalesPoint
        customerRepository - CustomerRepository : Customer database
        dbEmployee - DBEmployee : The employee database
        cProgram - CProgram the program
        dbcRoom - DBCRoom database of actual rooms in use
        dbSeat - DBSeat seat database
        dbRow - DBRow row database
        dbDate - DBDate CDateStorage database
        dbMovie - DBMovie movie database
        dbEvent - DBEvent event database
        dbRoom - DBRoom SaveRoom database

    • Method Detail

      • management

        @RequestMapping(value="/options.html")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public java.lang.String management(java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
        Checks the account and gives back the access rights
        Parameters:
        userAccount - Optional <UserAccount> : User account database
        Returns:
        Depends on the access rights. If fails get back to login page

      • account

        @RequestMapping(value="account.html")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public java.lang.String account(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                  java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount,
                                                                                                                  RegistrationForm customerForm,
                                                                                                                  addEmployee employeeForm)
        Leads you to the account settings site
        Parameters:
        model - Model: Provided by Spring
        userAccount - Optional <UserAccount> : the account of the user
        customerForm - RegistrationForm contains the customer data
        employeeForm - addEmployee contains the employee data
        Returns:
        account.html

      • custChange

        @RequestMapping(value="/custChange",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public java.lang.String custChange(java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> optional,
                                                                                                                                                  @ModelAttribute(value="form")
                                                                                                                                                  RegistrationForm customerForm,
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Called when a customer modifies their account data
        Parameters:
        optional - Optional <UserAccount> : the account of the user
        customerForm - RegistrationForm contains the customer data
        redirectAttributes - Provided by Spring
        result - BindingResult returning validated form errors
        Returns:
        account.html on success

      • staff

        @RequestMapping(value="/staff",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
public java.lang.String staff(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Leads you to the staff overview page, there you can change the stuff member attributes
        Parameters:
        model - Model : Provided by SalesPoint
        Returns:
        if has user level staff.html otherwise login.html

      • rooms

        @RequestMapping(value="/addRoom",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
public java.lang.String rooms(addroom form,
                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model modelMap)
        Leads the user if he is the boss to the room creating page
        Parameters:
        form - addroom : The data container of the room
        modelMap - Model : Provided by Spring
        Returns:
        if succsessful addRoom.html

      • addrooms

        @RequestMapping(value="/addRoom",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
public java.lang.String addrooms(@ModelAttribute(value="addroom")
                                                                                                                                                  addroom form,
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Adds new rooms to the database. Before adding anything it checks if the user is an Admin
        Parameters:
        model - Model : Provided by Spring
        form - addroom : the requed data form the form
        result - BindingResult : provided by Spring
        redirectAttributes - provided by Spring
        Returns:
        if everything was successful the method returns the string "success".

        If not the user get back to the login window. (return "login")

      • changeroom

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/changeRoom",

                                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)

        result - provided by Spring

      • changeroomdetail

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/changeRoomDetail",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String changeroomdetail(addEvent form,
                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                                   ChangeRoom from2,
                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Responsible for the changing of the room details. as allways you need boss level authorisation
        Parameters:
        form - addEvent : Adds a new event, the class contains all necercerry data holders
        model - Model : Provided by Spring
        from2 - ChangeRoom : The data container of the room the class contains all getter and setter
        redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes provided by Spring
        Returns:
        /changeRoom/changeRoomDetail.html

      • changeroomdetail

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/changeRoomDetail/{row}/{number}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String changeroomdetail(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(value="row")

                                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(value="number")
                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer seat)
        Responsible for the changing of the room details(In this case the seats). as always you need boss level authorization
        Parameters:
        model - Model : Provided by Spring
        row - Integer : The row number
        seat - Integer : The seat number
        Returns:
        /changeRoom/changeRoomDetail.html

      • addemployee

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/addEmployee",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addemployee(@ModelAttribute(value="addEmployeeForm")
                                                                                                                                                         addEmployee form,
                                                                                                                                                         org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Adding a new Employee if the user has the boss user level
        Parameters:
        form - addEmployee : Responsible for getter and setter of the employee also saves him inside the database
        result - BindingResult : Provided by Spring: org.springframework.validation.BindingResult
        redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes : Provided by Spring
        Returns:
        redirect:/staff.html if input fails validation return addEmployee.html

      • addEvent3rd

        @RequestMapping(value="/add/{roomId}/{movieId}/{year}/{month}/{day}/{hour}/{minute}/{private}",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\')")
public java.lang.String addEvent3rd(@PathVariable(value="roomId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long roomId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="movieId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long movieId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="year")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer year,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="month")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer month,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="day")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer day,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="hour")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer hour,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="minute")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer minute,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="private")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer isPrivate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Adds a new event with all new attributs
        Parameters:
        roomId - the specific room id
        movieId - the specific movie id
        year - the specific year
        month - the month of the event
        day - the day of the event
        hour - the hour of the event
        minute - the minutes of the event
        redirectAttributes - Provided by Spring
        isPrivate - private 1 = true 0 = false, needed if a customer wats his own event and meets a room for ir
        Returns:
        redirect:/addEven.html
